Ok for the idiot(s) who think scene4all went to the movies and recorded this  let me  replay the broken record for the 100 billionth time......Scene4all and all  the other folks who post torrents dont record these movies they do the best with what they are GIVEN.... the copies of the cams come from different countries ex Russia,China,India,Korea,etc....They have english and foreign language theaters there or they get the audio from somewhere that does ans sync them....they edit the video and audio for FREE for people like us to enjoy... sooo next time you decide to comment please by all means dont be thankful that these folks are even wasting their time doin this for everyone cause i really appreciated it  regardless of the quality ....
